description: Catalog of all DecentClaude tool output schemas

schemas.title: BigQuery Table Profile Output
schemas.description: Comprehensive table profiling results with statistics, quality scores, and anomaly detection

schemas.title: BigQuery Query Explain Output
schemas.description: Query execution plan analysis with bottlenecks and optimization suggestions

schemas.title: BigQuery Query Optimization Output
schemas.description: Automated query optimization recommendations with before/after comparisons

schemas.title: BigQuery SQL Validation Output
schemas.description: SQL syntax and semantic validation with error locations and suggestions

schemas.title: BigQuery Data Lineage Output
schemas.description: Table dependency graphs with upstream/downstream tracking and column-level lineage

schemas.title: Data Quality Audit Workflow Output
schemas.description: Multi-dimensional DQ assessment across datasets with completeness, validity, consistency, and timeliness scoring

schemas.title: Schema Migration Workflow Output
schemas.description: Schema change analysis with migration plans, rollback strategies, and impact assessment

schemas.title: AI Code Generation Output
schemas.description: LLM-powered code generation with alternatives, explanations, test cases, and confidence scores

schemas.title: dbt Test Results Output
schemas.description: dbt test execution results with pass/fail details, failed row samples, and remediation suggestions
